title: League mastery
body: Am I the only person pissed because of this new mastery thing? After playing an extreme amount of Janna/Nami I feel like I have to do it all over again due to this new mastery thing. Is there any way that we can show we have mastered a champ without having to play them another hundred times??

replies.body: sorry, what did you lose from this being implemented? Did you suddenly lose your ability to play those champs? Did the records of those games suddenly disappear? Grow up{{item:3070}}
Stop being a cry baby. You should think of this as a new challenge that you need to overcome not something that riot put in just  to torture us. ps rito can i have my soul back?
